about_the_game:
Get an explosion of summer sensation with Solitaire Beach Season 2. The paradise beaches of the Caribbean, luxury spa hotels, snow-white sands, a cruise over the warm waves of the Atlantic, a tour to the hospitable bays of Cuba – what else awaits you in this summer adventure? A legendary island of freedom and 120 new card deals. It’s an ideal match for all solitaire fans!

Pack your suitcase and head out on an exciting tour to a country of summer excitement! Classic solitaire complete with original game mechanics, perfectly suited for fans of traditional solitaire and connoisseurs of unusual gameplay styles alike. Match cards as fast as you can and a special multiplier will increase your reward! Buy useful bonuses: mulligan, shuffle and the Joker. Premium-quality graphics: colorful levels and outlandish tropical music will take you to the resort of your dreams and help you immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the summer holidays.

Have a blast with Solitaire Beach Season 2!

- Card solitaire game for new players and experts alike
- Unique game mechanics – choosing pairs of cards
- Use different bonuses – mulligan, shuffle, joker
- Collect gold cards to complete levels and unlock new locations
- Collect bonus cards to get more coins and bonuses
- Collect cards fast to make combos and get good rewards
- 12 locations, 120 levels and several difficulty modes
- For daring players, we offer special tasks and over 20 colorful trophies
- Colorful high-quality graphics in a tropical sea style
- Original themed decks and 9 card backs
- Beautiful music to help you relax and concentrate on the game
